abstract: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired Loli Wu, previously a banker at Citigroup, to be its head of transportation and infrastructure investment banking in the Americas.
snippet: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired Loli Wu, previously a banker at Citigroup, to be its head of transportation and infrastructure investment banking in the Americas.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired Loli Wu to be its head of transportation and infrastructure investment banking in the Americas.

headline.main: BofA Merrill Hires Transportation Banker From Citi
